BearerAuth.name: Authorization
BearerAuth.description:
JWT Token must be included with 'Bearer' prefix.

Format: Bearer your-jwt-token
Example: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9...

Note: The 'Bearer ' prefix is mandatory.
